job description:
The Retail Analytics team is looking for an exceptional individual to play an integral role in helping Apple Retail make decisions using data. You will partner with key stakeholders across Apple as you design, refine, and create innovative analyses and data products. This will include leveraging large and complex data sources, deriving actionable insights, delivering dynamic and intuitive decision tools, and presenting your findings to key executives. The ideal candidate is a self-motived team player, skilled in a broad set of analytical tools, with a strong passion for data and effective visualization techniques.
